text: Dub to Africa is a reggae album by Prince Far I. ==Track listing== #"Bass Ace" (3:51) #"Dub to Africa" (3:19) #"Good Music Brother" (3:35) #"Glory to God" (3:41) #"Hello, Love Brother" (5:31) #"Cry Tuff and the Originals" (3:22) #"Give Love" (3:59) #"Big Fight Dub" (4:13) #"Internal Dub" (4:07) #"Out of the Abyss" (4:02) ==Personnel== *Prince Far I - percussion, arrangements *Noel "Sowell" Bailey - guitar *Chinnaas Melchezinick - guitar *Errol "Flabba" Holt - bass *Lincoln "Style" Scott - drums Category:Prince Far I albums Category:1979 albums Category:Dub albums
title: Dub to Africa
